name: Dice Commands
desc: With these commands you can role virtual dice.

commands.name: .d4 [amount] [modifier]
commands.desc: Rolls a d4 dice and returns a value, user can specify how many dice to roll and if a modifier should be applied.

commands.name: .d6 [amount] [modifier]
commands.desc: Rolls a d6 dice and returns a value, user can specify how many dice to roll and if a modifier should be applied.

commands.name: .d8 [amount] [modifier]
commands.desc: Rolls a d8 dice and returns a value, user can specify how many dice to roll and if a modifier should be applied.

commands.name: .d10 [amount] [modifier]
commands.desc: Rolls a d10 dice and returns a value, user can specify how many dice to roll and if a modifier should be applied.

commands.name: .d12 [amount] [modifier]
commands.desc: Rolls a d12 dice and returns a value, user can specify how many dice to roll and if a modifier should be applied.

commands.name: .d20 [amount] [modifier]
commands.desc: Rolls a d20 dice and returns a value, user can specify how many dice to roll and if a modifier should be applied.

commands.name: .d100% [amount] [modifier]
commands.desc: Rolls a d100% dice and returns a value, user can specify how many dice to roll and if a modifier should be applied.
